name: XOXO NECKLACE
description: Elevate your style with the XOXO Necklace from KS Jewels, a chic and romantic piece featuring a playful XOXO design. Crafted with precision by Kunika, this necklace comes with a sleek Box Chain option, perfect for layering or wearing solo

name: SMILEY RING
description: A playful Smiley Ring crafted for instant charm. Its bold design adds a fun twist to everyday outfits, perfect for layering or standalone wear

name: CZ PAVE CUFF EARRING
description: Sparkling CZ Pavé Cuff Earrings with intricate detailing. The dazzling stones catch the light effortlessly, ideal for both casual and evening looks.

name: MULTICOLOR TENNIS BRACELET
description: Make a bold statement with this vibrant Multicolor Tennis Bracelet, featuring an eye-catching array of colors for a playful yet elegant look. Perfect for adding a pop of color to any outfit.

name: CZ HAND CHAIN
description: Delicate CZ Hand Chain adorned with shimmering cubic zirconia. A graceful addition to accentuate wrists, designed for versatility and elegance

name: iced kaete pave ring
description: An Iced Kate Pavé Ring featuring a sleek pavé setting. Its minimalist brilliance makes it a timeless piece for stacking or solo statement wear

name: ICED JUMBO LETTER NECKLACE
description: The Iced Jumbo Letter Necklace is a bold and eye-catching accessory that makes a statement! It is available in all letters from A to Z, allowing you to personalize your necklace with your initial or the letter of your choice.

name: OVAL ECLIPSE TWO-TONE EARRING
description: The Oval Eclipse Two-Tone Earring features an oval shape and a mix of contrasting metals, creating a bold, contemporary look. The combination of gold and silver tones adds sophistication, making them perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions.

name: GREEN BUBBLE DANGLE EARRING

name: ICED EP TEDDY NECKLACE

name: CZ TEARDROP NECKLACE
description: The CZ Teardrop Necklace combines timeless elegance with modern sophistication. Made from 925 sterling silver and plated with 14k gold, this necklace offers both durability and a luxurious finish. The CZ Teardrop Necklace combines timeless elegance with modern sophistication. Made from 925 sterling silver and plated with 14k gold, this necklace offers both durability and a luxurious finish. The pendant features a classic teardrop shape, enhanced with a sparkling cubic zirconia center stone. Perfect for any occasion, the epjewels.com CZ Teardrop Necklace adds a touch of enduring glamour to your ensemble, making it a versatile and stylish addition to your jewelry collection.
